short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display lots of useful hardware and network info

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a simple Chrome App to showcase chrome.system.* APIs.

Check out public source at https://github.com/beaufortfrancois/cog-chrome-app

Changelog:

0.0.14:
- Show CPU temperature in Fahrenheit on click (Chrome OS only)
- Add display mode refresh rate in hertz.


0.0.13:
- Added CPU temperatures (Chrome OS only)

0.0.12 (works best with Chrome 42):
- Added window frame color

0.0.11:
- Fixed CPU Usage (again)

0.0.10:
- Fixed vertical scrolling.

0.0.9:
- Fixed High CPU Usage.

0.0.8:
- Added External and Internal Storage.

0.0.7:
- Fixed CPU Usage thanks to Christopher!
